last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 23
last_episode_to_air.overview: Victoria, Sille and Albert makes it to the main land, but where is everyone? They follow a trail marked by Carl. Something strange is underway.

name: The Camp
overview: It is summer and Albert, Viktoria, Carl, Milo and Niklas are looking forward to their trip to the remote island, to get a break from their hectic lives, parents and school. They do not know each other, but all seems well until a strange flash of light appears on the ferry, and shortly after their arrival at the island, they loose all contact - they realize that they are on their own, and everything on the island is not what they appear to be.

episodes.name: The Island
episodes.overview: Viktoria, Albert, Niklas, Carl and Milan meets at the harbor together with other kids going on the camp. From the beginning strange things happens, and this seems not to become an ordinary camp.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Stig is missing and Carl and Milan has taken control of the camp. Victoria, Albert and Niklas set out to search for Stig, and end up at the inn, where Niklas find a strange skull hidden in Silles camper.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Viktoria wants to call for help, but the camps landline is not working. She steals Carls cellphone. Together with Albert and Niklas they try to find a signal, and end up in the old lighthouse.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Carl and Milan forces Albert and Niklas to steal from the grocery store. While keeping guard they spot a tall black man and make their getaway, leaving Albert and Niklas on their own.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Everyone is angry at Viktoria for lying about seeing a boat, then Milan finds and old dinghy. Carl wants to prove that it can be used, even though Albert warns him that it may not be seaworthy.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Viktoria, Albert and Niklas are on the run from Carl and Milan. They seek refuge at Sille's house, but she won't let them in. With nowhere to go, they decide to make a shelter in the forest.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Viktoria, Albert and Niklas awake in the forest and are hungry. Albert suggest they go looking for berries, but Niklas would rather return to camp to get proper food. While looking for food Viktoria and Albert run into Carl and Milan.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Sille wants Viktoria and Albert to help getting food from the farm. Viktoria does not want to milk the goat or slaughter the chicken. Carl still wants to get hold of the phone, to prevent the incident at the pier being revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview:
While Viktoria and Sille prepare the chicken for dinner, Albert and Niklas goes to the pier, to see if they can retrieve Alberts knife.

They bring the stilts but too late realize that Carl and Milan has found out about the secret behind the tall man

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After having found the secret behind the tall man, Carl and Milan surprise Sille in the kitchen. Niklas has a plan for how to save her.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Carl and Milan have moved into the farm, and enjoy their life. In the forest, Viktoria, Sille, Albert and Niklas are hungry and wants to go home. But how will they get in touch with the main land?

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Carl and Milan are still in charge of the farm, so Viktoria, Sille Albert and Niklas sees no other way than to try a peace offering. Sille has a different plan, and betray the others.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Viktoria, Sille, Albert and Niklas try to raise the sunken dinghy without luck. Niklas suggest that they build a raft. Sille would rather focus on gathering food, so the group split up. Meanwhile Carl and Milan are looking for Albert.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Viktoria and Niklas finds a lot materials that they can use for building a new raft. Albert and Sille go fishing. Back at the farm the kids are getting hungry, and Carl tries to calm them down.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Viktoria and Niklas has completed the raft, and proudly shows it to Albert and Sille. Sille is worried about the goat, and she and Albert return to the farm. At the farm Carl and Milan are planning an ambush.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Carl and Milan returns to the camp with Sille, to make her start the generator. In the RV Victoria does he best to cook a meal of seaweed, while Albert is planning how to rescue Sille.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Niklas wants to go back to the camp to get some food, but the 3 others warns him that it may be dangerous. Carl sends out the young kids to look for the RV.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Victoria, Sille, Albert and Niklas want to get the RV, so they return to the camp. Sille and Albert sneak in to steal the keys. Niklas betray Sille, by calling for Carl and Milan. Victoria and Albert discover a boat.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Victoria and Albert can't agree on whether to rescue Sille or steal the boat. Meanwhile Milan takes over control of the island. He wants to slaughter the goat so that they can have a proper meal.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: When Milan and the others return to kill the goat, it is gone. Milan accuses Carl of letting it go. Victoria and Albert launches the boat, and return to rescue Sille. Meanwhile Sille manages to get the skull, and uses the RV to escape.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Albert and Victoria tries to get Sille down to the boat, to get her to the main land. Milan discover their plan, and wants to take the boat to shore together with Carl and Niklas. Then Albert have a sudden courage to speak up.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Victoria and Sille tries to stop Milan from leaving the island with Carl, Niklas and Albert. When they fail, their only option is the old dinghy, but will it be able to float?

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Victoria, Sille and Albert makes it to the main land, but where is everyone? They follow a trail marked by Carl. Something strange is underway.
